data.text:
Fantastic two night stop over at the Grand Hyatt Hotel in Dubai. Thanks to the team for making our stay as seamless and hassle free as possible. And a shout out to Ganga by the pool who - along with the rest of the team - worked tirelessly to make sure we didn't need to lift a finger. Couldn't have asked for more from across the whole staff group from housekeeping through to the guys on the door.

Finally - although a corporate hotel which means you could be almost anywhere in the world - the rooms were large, clean and well stocked. And there is a fantastic breakfast spread (the French toast is a particularly highlight!) and great facilities. Highly recommend and would return.
data.title: Two night stopover with seamless service and great facilities

data.text:
I went to Laylati at Grand Hyatt for Suhoor.
Amazing experience and ambiance. I loved the grand ceiling and decor for ramadan. The pomegranate juice, hummous platter, chicken shawarma and Moroccan tea were delicious. Amazing service by staff, who was very friendly especially Hemanshu.
data.title: Great for Suhoor at Laylati

data.text: Im so upset from the way the hotel üè® was  deal it with us , such lies just to cover on the staff of the hotel the incident made me really upset i have first time ever booking in grand hyatt hotel and i found them an professional with dealing with customer we ben given wrong information from the reception employee regarding our booking with the hotel and the suhur meal which most of hotel is providing with booking in Ramdan with have reached the tent of the hotel with innocent behavior but after ordering and finishing our meal we found an professional way of treat from the staff of the restaurant and even from the supervisor of the restaurant an respectful behave with rudest way that we have to pay for the suhur meal , which there hotel staff have given us a wrong info ‚ÑπÔ∏è we tried several time to explain that this was problem from your side not from our side but there was no justice even they made us a lier in they way of talk so its really made our day a hell no one has support it us no customer service no respect !!! Im really so much upset from this kind of behavior and i wish to change those people who doesn‚Äôt deserve to work in such positions who they cant handle the customer and i will never ever book a gain in this hotel .
data.title: Poor customer service and behavior zero

data.text: Great hotel, great Chain. Received an upgrade. Rooms are spacious and very classy and clean.  Great views as well. Should keep an eye on the outside grounds, clearly nearby pet owners don't clean up after their dogs. The location is fab , so easy to reach everywhere.
data.title: Excellent Hotel. Ticks all boxes.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear sui186525,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience at our hotel, particularly the spacious and classy rooms, as well as the great views.

We appreciate your feedback regarding the cleanliness of the outside grounds. Please rest assured that we will address this concern with our housekeeping team to ensure that the external areas are kept clean and well-maintained at all times.
We are glad to hear that you found our location convenient for exploring the city.

We thank you once again and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Warm Regards,
Grand Hyatt Dubai Team
owner_response.author: Fathi Khogaly

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear arezoe761,

Thank you for taking the time to write about your recent experience at Grand Hyatt Dubai. We are thrilled to learn that you really enjoyed your time with us and the staff was very helpful. We thank you for the kind feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Warm Regards,
Grand Hyatt Dubai Team
